name: file_manager
author: openclaw@example.com
description: Manages files in a sandboxed workspace: create, read, edit, list, move, and delete files safely

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action to perform: create, read, edit, list, move, delete, search

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: File or directory path (relative to workspace)

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: Term to search for in files

examples: Create a Python file called hello.py with a hello world function
List all Python files in the workspace
Search for TODO comments in all files
